messages.content: Hey! Excited to learn more about the opportunities at InnovateTech!
Hi Alex! Great to connect. We'd love to chat about our open positions. Are you available for a quick call this week?
Absolutely! I'm free Wednesday or Thursday afternoon. What works best for you?
Hi there! I'm really interested in GreenTech's mission. Would love to discuss potential design roles!
Hi Sarah! We're actually looking for a senior UX designer right now. Your portfolio looks amazing! Let's schedule a chat soon.
Hey Marcus! We saw your ML background and think you'd be a great fit for our AI robotics team. Interested in learning more?
